name: Concurrent Sentence
description:
Unravel the case of River Henckley in a courtroom of illusions. What is right? What is real? Discover the answers (or lack thereof) in Concurrent Sentence. This project was conceived during GDK JointJam '22 with the prompt "Gotcha", but has since evolved into a larger,  more polished narrative.

Credits:

Jackson Willis - Designer/Writer

Zen Panos - Art

Brandon Mrgich - Sound
